member.name: IHolographicSpaceInterop.CreateForWindow
member.summary: Instantiates a HolographicSpace object, and binds it to the current application.
member.param: Handle to the window of the active application.

param.name: riid
param.para: The RUID for the resource interface.
The REFIID, or GUID, of the interface to the resource can be obtained by using the __uuidof() macro. For example, __uuidof(IRadialController) will get the GUID of the interface to a buffer resource.

member.param: Address of a pointer to a HolographicSpace object.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IHolographicSpaceInterop
member.summary: Enables interoperability with a WinRT HolographicSpace object, and provides access to HolographicSpace members for representing a holographic scene.
